text: Na veṭhitasīsassa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā
edit: Na veṭhitasīsassa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā

translations.transtext: 66. I will not teach Dhamma to a person wearing headgear who is not ill: a training to be observed.
๖๖. พึงทำศึกษาว่า “เราจักไม่แสดงธรรมแก่บุคคลไม่ใช่ผู้เจ็บไข้พันศีรษะ”
66. I shall not teach Dhamma to one wearing a headwrapping who is not sick: this is a training to be done.
